description.value: This extension is to indicate whether hiearchies were applied to a Condition Category, or to apply hiearchies is not applicable.

short.value: This is to indicate whether hiearchies were applied or not to a Condition Category, or to apply hiearchies to a Condition Category is not applicable: applied|not-applied|not-applicable

definition.value: Hiearchies applied to a Condition Category status

comment.value: This extension represents the status of whether hiearchies were applied to a Condition Category. Use the code not-applicable, if it is not applicable to apply hiearchies to a Condition Category.

short.value: Indicate whether hiearchies were applied or not applied to a Condition Category, or to apply hiearchies to a Condition Category is not applicable.
